revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR940N |revision=v2.x |series=N300 |fcc_date=06/08/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR941NXV5 |ic_id=8853A-WR941ND |pcb_id=2050500297 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F8:1A:67 |oui_eth=F8:1A:67 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tplink.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR940N Product page]
"2050500297" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device is presumed to use AR9341 (though this is not confirmed)..
The default SSID format is likely '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''. :Presumed F8:1A:67 OUI from the FCC EUT's MAC label..
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr940n ''TP-LINK TL-WR940N'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
